95083.「貴様のような素性の知れぬ者を\n 聖都エジャルナに 入れるわけにはいかぬ。\n:
We will not allow a stranger such as yourself
into Ejarna. Leave immediately!

95084.「……むむ？\n その手に持っている物は まさか……。:
Hmmm? What is that there in your hand?
Isn't that...

95086.「な…なんと！！\n そなたは エステラさまから\n 直々に 許可をいただいてき:
W-what?! You're saying that you received
permission from Estella?

95087.「失礼しました！\n どうぞ お通りください！: Our apologies! Please, right this way!

95088.「エステラさまでしたら\n すでに お戻りになっておられます。\n おそらく 大:
If it's from Estella, then that means she's
already returned here. She is most likely
in the Great Temple.

95089.「待てっ！\n 奇妙な姿をした 怪しいヤツめ！\n いったい 大神殿に なんの用:
Stop, you strange looking creature! What
business do you have with the Great Temp...

95092.「来てくださったのですね <pc>さん。\n 聖都エジャルナへ ようこそ。:
I'm glad you came, <pc>. Welcome
to the Holy City of Ejarna.

95093.「はじめまして <pc>さん。\n ナドラガ教団の総主教をつとめる\n オルスト:
It's nice to meet you, <pc>. My
name is Orstov, and I am Patriarch of the
Nadraga Order.

95094.「あなたのご活躍は このエステラから\n 聞いています。アペカの村を救っていただ:
I have heard of your heroic deeds from dear
Estella here. There are no words to express
my utmost gratitude.

95095.「今 この世界には ただならぬ危機が迫っており\n そのために 各地で 異変が生:
A terrible crisis looms upon the world as we speak, and is causing many abnormalities to occur all over. These abnormalities also
threaten the lives of many.

95096.「その危機とは 邪悪なる意志と呼ばれるモノ。\n 影のように忍び寄り 姿は見せず:
That crisis is something called the Evil Will.
It lurks in the shadows, staying hidden...
But it is no doubt something that exists.

95097.「アペカの村の近くに現れた 魔炎鳥の正体は\n 姿を変えた 聖鳥であったそうです:
It seems that the Darkflame that appeared near
Apeka Village was in fact Flamia transformed.
This must also be the Evil Will's doing...

95098.「私たち ナドラガ教団は この世界を守るべく\n 邪悪なる意志に 戦いを挑んでい:
We of the Nadraga Order are fighting against
the Evil Will to protect this world.

95099.「今 私たちは 共に戦ってくれる者を\n 求めています。ぜひとも\n <pc>さ:
And now, we are looking for those who would
fight with us. We would be honored if you
would help us, <pc>.

95100.「これから 神殿内の集会所で\n 今後の教団の活動について 話し合いますので\n:
We will be discussing the future plans of the
Order in the temple's assembly hall. Please
attend if you would like.

95102.「このカタブツのエステラに\n ここまで 信頼を寄せさせるとは……\n あなた:
It's quite surprising someone as stubborn as
Estella agreed to trust you. You must've
used some kind of magic... what was it?

95103.「まあ 総主教さま！\n そんな ご冗談ばかり言って！:
P-Patriarch! Please don't joke around like
that!

95104.「なんだ あいつは？\n 得体のしれない姿をしているな……。:
Who the hell is that? They look really
strange...

95108.「失礼ながら 総主教さま……\n そこにいる どこのトカゲの骨とも知れぬ者に\n:
With all due respect, your holiness... do you
really think it's wise to share such vital
information with this unknown creature here?

95109.「神官トビアス。心配には 及びません。\n その方……<pc>さんの出席は\n:
There is no need to worry, Tobias. Their
presence here was specifically requested by
me.

95110.「皆さんが ここで議論を重ねている間に\n <pc>さんは 魔物と化した聖鳥を\:
While you've all been standing here debating,
<pc> here restored Flamia from being
a horrible monster and saved Apeka Village.

95111.「なんと 炎の領界の守護者である聖鳥が\n 魔物になっていたとな……！？:
What? The Fire Realm's guardian turned into
a monster...?!

95112.「これも 邪悪なる意志のしわざか……。: It was the Evil Will's doing, wasn't it...

95114.「……神官の皆さんは ご存知のとおり\n このナドラガンドは 炎 氷 闇 水 嵐:
As everyone here already knows, Nadragand is
divided into five realms: fire, ice, dark,
water, and storm.

95115.「邪悪なる意志に 対抗するためには\n ５つの領界を ひとつに つなぎ\n 全竜:
In order for us to defeat this Evil Will, the
five realms must all unite as one and all
Nadravians must combine their strength.

95116.「私たち ナドラガ教団の 最初の目的は\n ここ 炎の領界のとなりにある\n 氷:
The Order's first objective is to open the way
to the Ice Realm, which is the realm closest
to this one...

95117.「古文書によれば この地の南西にある\n 業炎の聖塔におもむき 試練を果たしたと:
According to old texts, it is said that the way to the Ice Realm shall open if one travels to the Fire Tower to the southwest and
undergoes its trials.

95118.「その試練を果たせる者こそが 解放者であり\n 我々は その出現を待ち望んでいま:
And the one who can overcome those trials is
the liberator, who we have eagerly been
waiting for.

95119.「竜族の民は 希望を求めています。\n そして 解放者こそが 竜族の希望……。\:
All of dragonkind are searching for hope.
And the liberator is that hope... they are the
only one who can save this world.

95120.「皆さん 祈りましょう。\n 解放者の出現を……。:
Let us all join in prayer, for the coming of
the liberator...

95121.「<pc>さん。\n あなたに お話ししたいことが あります。\n あとで 私の:
There's something I need to talk to you about.
Could you join me in my room?

95122.「私の部屋は ２階の西側にあります。\n それでは……。:
My room is on the west side of the second
floor. I will see you there.

95124.「先ほど 聞いていただいたとおり\n 私たち神官は ５つの領界をつなぎ\n ナド:
As you heard earlier, we priests want to
connect the five realms and bring salvation to
Nadragand.

95125.「……<pc>さん。あなたは\n なんのために この世界へ来たのですか？\n さ:
I hope you don't mind me asking,
<pc>... But why did you come to this
world?

95126.<pc>は エステラに\n友人たちが この世界に\n連れ去られてしまったことを:
<pc> explained to Estella that
their friends were kidnapped and taken
to this world.

95127.「……そんなことが。\n ですが なるほど。理解できました。:
...So that's what happened. I understand your
situation now.

95128.「<pc>さん 今の腹話術……\n あなたが こんな特技を持っていたなんて\n:
You know ventriloquism...? I'm surprised you
have a knack for something so difficult!

95129.「……他の領界で 邪悪なる意志の情報を\n 集めることができれば あなたのご友人:
If we can learn more about the Evil Will in
the other realms, we're likely to find your
missing friends.

95130.「竜族と無関係である あなたに頼むのは\n 心苦しく 思っていましたが\n それ:
I'm hesitant to ask for your assistance, since
you are not Nadravian. However, it's mutually
beneficial for us to help each other.

95131.「<pc>さん。よろしければ\n 氷の領界への道を開くため 私たちに\n チカラ:
<pc>, please help us pave the way to
the Ice Realm. We will do our best to assist
you.

95132.「……氷の領界への道を開くには\n 業炎の聖塔におもむき いくつかの試練を\n:
...for us to get there, you will have to enter
the Fire Tower and overcome its trials.

95133.「最初の試練であった 塔の入口の解放は\n 神官トビアスによって すでに解かれて:
Tobias has completed the first trial,
which opened the tower's entrance but... the
second trial remains unfinished.

95134.「その試練は 水の満ちた球体の中に置かれた\n 燭台に 炎を灯すというものです。:
This trial is to light a flame on a brazier
placed inside a sphere filled with water.

95135.「燭台が 水の中にあるのに\n どうやって 炎を灯すというのか……？:
How is it possible to light a brazier when
it's totally submerged...?

95136.「そこで <pc>さん。\n しばらくの間 私に 付き合ってほしいのです。:
That's why I'd like you to accompany me for
a while.

95137.「おそらく ふたつ目の試練を解くカギは\n フェザリアス山という場所に あるはず:
Perhaps the key to solving the second trial
lies in a place called Featherias Mountain...

95138.「まずは 準備のために 通り道にある\n マティルという村に 立ち寄ることにしま:
To make our preparations, we must first make a
stop at Matil Village on our way. Can you
please head there first?

95139.「マティルの村は この町の西門から出て\n 烈火の渓谷と呼ばれる地を\n 北に:
Matil Village is located outside the town's
west gate, in the northern part of the Valley
of Fire.

95140.「その村は すでに 人の住まぬ廃墟ですが……\n ひとつだけ 建物が残っています:
The village is in ruins and long since been
deserted... but one house still remains. Meet
me at the altar in that house's second floor.

95141.「幼い頃は その祭壇の前で 毎日のように\n 聖鳥に 祈りを捧げていました……。:
When I was little, I used to stand at that
altar and pray to Flamia every day...

95142.「ここは 炎に包まれた 過酷な世界ですが\n 私たちは 皆でチカラを合わせ\n:
This world was harsh, engulfed in fire... but
we all lived on and never gave up hope. We
could all depend on one another.

95143.「最後まで 病気にかからなかった私も\n いずれ 死にゆく運命にありました。:
Even I, who was the last to get sick, was
doomed to die sooner or later.

95144.「……そんな 私を拾い\n 絶望の底から 救ってくださったのが\n 総主教オルス:
It was Orstov who found me and rescued me
from the depths of despair...

95145.「塔の解放を急ぐ 教団の意志に背き\n 私が アペカの村に向かったのは 滅びゆく:
I went to Apeka Village against the Order's will, as I wanted to liberate the tower. The image of that dying village reminded me too
much of my hometown...

95146.「何もしないで 村を見殺しにすることが\n 私には できなかったのです……。:
I couldn't just stand by idly and watch that
village die...

95148.「これは 聖鳥の炎を授かる際に\n 必要となる 奉炎のトーチというものです。:
This is the Torch of Offering, which is needed
to receive Flamia's holy flame.

95149.「かつて この村では聖鳥を崇めていました。\n 魔物を退ける聖鳥の炎を 授かるた:
In the past, this village worshipped Flamia.
We traveled to its nest inside the volcano to
receive its flame, which kept monsters at bay.

95150.「決して消えることがないと言われる\n あの炎ならば 水の中にある燭台にも\n:
It's said that that flame never goes out,
so perhaps it could be used to light that
brazier in the water...

95151.「ひとつ やらなければならないことがあります。\n 聖鳥が生まれた場所である フ:
There is one thing I must do. Please come with
me to Featherias Mountain. It is where Flamia
was born.

95152.「フェザリアス山は 村の北西にある火山です。\n ふもとで 落ち合うことにしまし:
Featherias Mountain is a large volcano located
northwest of the village. I'll meet you at the
base.

95153.「炎の領界の守護者よ。お願いがあります。\n 聖なる炎を 我々に お授けください:
O guardian of the Fire Realm, hear my plea...
Please grant us the sacred flame.

95155.「こうして 炎を授かることができたのも\n <pc>さんのおかげです。:
It's thanks to your help that I was able
to receive this flame.

95156.「この炎ならば 水の中にある燭台にも\n きっと 灯すことができるでしょう。:
I have no doubt this flame can light that
brazier in the water.

95157.「氷の領界への道……業炎の聖塔は\n 聖都エジャルナより はるか 南西にあります:
The Fire Tower is located far southwest from
Ejarna. Let's make our way there quickly.

95158.「ふむ。この炎の呪文でも ダメか。\n となると もっと強力な……:
Hmm... even my fire spells are no good...
There must be something powerful enough...

95159.「トビアス。\n 私たちに 代わってくれませんか？: Tobias, would you mind letting us take over?

95160.「エステラか……。\n 神官の身分でありながら\n よそ者と 行動しているとはな:
Estella...? I didn't know a priestess such as
yourself was in league with this stranger.

95161.「まあいいだろう。好きにするがいい。: Well, fine. Do you as you please.

95162.「おお！ なんだ あの炎は！？: Oh! What kind of fire is that?!

95164.「見事だな エステラ。\n 私は 第一の試練を攻略し\n お前は 第二の試練を攻:
Well done, Estella. I overcame the first
trial, and you overcame the second one.

95165.「……言うなれば これで互角。\n どちらが 氷の領界への道を開き\n 解放者と:
I guess you can say we're evenly matched...
Which one of us will open the way to the Ice
Realm and become liberator, I wonder?

95166.「まったく……。今は\n 功を競っている 場合ではないのに……。:
Really, Tobias... now is not the time for a
silly competition...

95167.「<pc>さん。\n 私たちも 先へ向かいましょう。: Let's be on our way, too.

95169.「なるほどな……。\n どうやら ここが最後の試練のようだ。: I see... so this must be the final trial.

95174.「手出しは無用と 言ったはずだ！: I told you not to interfere!

95175.「今のオレがあるのも\n 孤児だったオレを オルストフさまが\n 救ってくださっ:
I am the person I am today because Orstov
saved me while I was an orphan...

95176.「領界をつなぐという オルストフさまの夢は\n オレの夢でもあり 竜族全体の希望:
Orstov's dream of connecting all the realms is
my dream too... for the hope of all
dragonkind...

95177.「この剣 オルストフさまのために！: I wield this blade in the name of Orstov!

95179.「まさか あの番人を倒してしまうとはな……。\n どうやら 功をあせる気持ちが\:
To think they beat that guardian... It seems
I was blinded by my eagerness to defeat
it.

95180.「ふふ。あなたの 総主教さまに対する想いも\n なかなかのものですね。\n 先ほ:
Hehe... your feelings for the Patriarch are
very strong. I was quite moved by your words.

95182.<cs_pchero>は\n炎の解錠の円盤（だいじなもの）を 手に入れた！<me:
<cs_pchero> received
the Fire Unlocking Disc (Key Item)!<me 60>

95184.「以前 塔の周辺を調査した時\n 外の遺跡で その円盤と同じ形のくぼみを\n 見:
That looks like the same shape as a hollow I
saw in the ruins close to the tower.

95185.「そこに 円盤をはめれば\n 何かが起きるかもしれません。:
If you put that disk there, something may
happen.

95186.「<cs_pchero>さん。塔の外にある\n 円盤の遺跡に 向かってみましょう:
Let's head to the Disc Ruins located outside
the tower.

95187.「私たちも 向かおう。\n この目で見届けたいからな。:
We'll go there, too. I want to see that with
my own eyes.

95190.「氷の領界に通じる道なのか……。\n この目で 見ることができようとは……。:
Is this the path to the Ice Realm...? I never
thought I'd lay my eyes upon it...

95191.「……<pc>さん。\n 私は アペカの村の近くで 倒れていた\n あなたを見た:
Ever since I found you collapsed near Apeka
Village, I've been thinking...

95192.「……皆さん。\n 以上のことから 私は 確信しました。:
Everyone... with all that said, I am now
convinced.

95193.「<pc>さんこそが 竜族の希望……:
<pc> is the hope of the
Nadravians...

95196.「解放者さま……。\n これまでの無礼な物言いの数々……。\n どうか お許しく:
Great liberator... please forgive me for my
foolhardy attitude towards you.

95197.「総主教さまより もし領界がつながった時は\n 解放者さまを 危険にさらさぬよう:
The Patriarch has ordered us not to put the
liberator in danger if the realms are to be
connected.

95198.「氷の領界の安全の確認が取れるまで\n この通路は 封鎖させていただきます。\n:
Until we confirm the Ice Realm's safety, this
passage will be off limits. For now, let us
report this to the Patriarch.

95199.「私とトビアスは 先に戻っていますので\n すぐに 大神殿の２階にある\n 総主:
Tobias and I will go on ahead, so please come
to the Patriarch's room in the Great Temple's
second floor as soon as you can.

95202.「よもやとは 思っていましたが……\n やはり あなたこそが そうであったか。:
I had a feeling... it looks like you really
are the one, aren't you?

95203.「<pc>。\n 我々が待ち望んだ 解放者よ。:
<pc>. You are the liberator we
have been waiting for.

95204.「どうか これからも\n 私たち ナドラガ教団に\n チカラを お貸しください。:
We hope that you will continue to aid the
Nadraga Order in the days to come.

95205.「そうですね……。\n 解放者である あなたには\n 私たちの真の目的を 話して:
Right... As the liberator, I will tell you our
true purpose.

95206.「我らナドラガ教団の目的 それは……: The Nadraga Order's true purpose is...

95207.「５つの領界に封印されている\n 竜族の神 ナドラガ神を復活させること。:
To resurrect the god of the Nadravians,
Nadraga, who is sealed across the five realms.

95208.「神代の昔 竜族を創りたまいしナドラガ神は\n 邪悪なる意志の悪しきチカラで ５:
In ancient times, Nadraga, the creator of our
species, was sealed in five separate realms
by the wicked power of the Evil Will.

95209.「あなたも すでに見たかもしれませんが\n この炎の領界にある 竜の頭部の形をし:
As you've most likely already seen, the dragon
shaped rock in this realm is a piece of
Nadraga himself.

95210.「この世界を 苦難より救うには\n ナドラガ神の復活が必要不可欠。そのために\n:
Nadraga's resurrection is the key to saving
this world from suffering. That is why the
five realms must be connected.

95211.「……何はともあれ 氷の領界への道がつながり\n ひと安心。この暑さにも ウンザ:
Anyways, what a relief that the way to the Ice
Realm is now open. I'm tired of this heat, so
I think I'll go there to cool myself off!

95213.「やれやれ……。うちの子たちは 皆\n アタマが固くて いけませんな。:
Dear me... you are all so hard-headed, aren't
you?

95214.「さて <pc>さん。\n 氷の領界へは 行けるようになりましたが\n まずは:
So, <pc>. We can now travel to
the Ice Realm, but first we have to make sure
it is safe before we do.

95215.「来るべき時が 来るまで\n お身体を 休めておいてください。: Please rest yourself until that time comes.

95233.<center>怒れるガズバランが 打ち込みし\n炎のくさびを 取り払わんとする:
Ye who seek to remove the wedge of flame,
struck by the enraged Gazbalan...

95234.「私が 先に挑ませてもらおう。\n 言っておくが 手出しは 無用だぞ！:
I'll be the first to undergo this challenge.
But be warned... do not interfere!

95235.「いけない。このままでは……。: He can't go on like this...

98318.「……では 始めるとしよう。\n ナドラガ教団の今後の活動について\n 総主教さ:
Now, let us begin. The Patriarch would like to
discuss the future plans of the Nadraga
Order.

98319.「……静かに。\n 総主教さまのお話は これからなのだぞ。: Silence. The Patriarch is about to speak.

98334.「……おお！！\n お待ちしておりました 解放者さま！: Oh! We've been waiting for you, liberator!

98335.「……総主教さま。\n 教団の盟主として 軽々しい行動は\n どうか お控えくだ:
Your holiness... as head of the Order, you
mustn't be so reckless.

102835.「総主教さま。こちらが\n 先ほど お話しした <pc>さんです。\n 信用に足:
This is <pc> that I told you
about earlier. I assure you that they are
indeed trustworthy.

102839.「私は 所用がありますので 先に\n マティルの村に 向かっていてください。\n:
I have some business I must attend to, so
please make your way to Matil Village first.
Thank you, and take care.

102840.「そこで トビアス。\n 氷の領界の調査は あなたに まかせます。\n よろしく:
Tobias. I leave the investigation of the
Ice Realm to you. I'm expecting good things.

102841.「かしこまりました。\n すでに 何人か 派遣してあります。\n 私も すぐに:
Understood. I've already sent some men to go
and survey, and I will join them shortly.

102842.「私も 氷の領界へ向かって よろしいですか？\n 解放者さまのため すこしでも\:
May I also go to the Ice Realm? I would like
to gather as much information as I can for
the liberator's sake.

102843.「認めましょう エステラ。\n ですが あなたは トビアスの報告を待ち\n 安全:
Very well, Estella. But I suggest waiting for
Tobias' report and only going when you
know it is safe.

102844.「<pc>さん。よろしければ この後\n 私の部屋まで 来ていただけませんか？\:
If it's all right, could you come to my
room again? Please come whenever you have
a moment.

102845.「あなたの これまでの苦労に報いるため\n 個人的に お礼を用意させていただきま:
As thank you for all of your hard work so far,
I have prepared this special gift for you.
Please take it.

106622.<pc>は 台座のくぼみに\n炎の解錠の円盤を はめ込んだ！:
<pc> placed the Fire Unlocking
Disc into the pedestal's hollow!

114817.「さて <pc>さん。\n 氷の領界の 安全の確認が取れるまでは\n まだ しば:
It will be some time before we can be certain
the Ice Realm is safe.

117854.「この世界の 解放者なのです！: They are the liberator of this world!

118605.「……最初は ただの はやり病だと\n 皆 思っていたのです。:
At first, everyone thought it was just a
passing illness...

118606.「それが おそろしい死病だと\n 気づいたときには もう 手遅れでした。:
By the time they realized it was a horrible
and deadly disease, it was too late...

118608.「そして 私の母も。多くの村人が\n その死神に 命を奪われていったのです……。:
And then my mother. Many villagers' lives
were claimed to that disease...

118609.「最後に残された弟だけは なんとか救いたい。\n その一心で 私は 思いつく限り:
My brother was the last alive, and I wanted to
save him. Thinking of nothing else, I did
everything I could to keep him safe.

118610.「あの子も 目の前で 息を引き取り\n 気がつけば この村で 生き残ったのは\n:
But he died right before my eyes... and I
found myself as the village's lone survivor...

118611.「私は オルストフさまのもとで\n 厳しい修行に 打ち込み\n ナドラガ教団の:
I devoted myself to rigorous training under
Orstov's teachings, and became a priestess
of the Nadraga Order.

118612.「二度と マティルの村のような不幸は\n 起こさないと 心に誓いを立て\n 人々:
I vowed I would never let something like what
happened in Matil Village happen ever again...
and sought the power to save others.

118613.「我らの待ち望んだ解放者が\n ついに……。ついに 現れてくれた。\n これで:
The liberator we've waited so long for...
Finally... Finally they have appeared. There
is now hope for our future.

118614.「たゆたう炎よ……。\n 解放者がもたらす 希望の行く末を\n 今ここに 示して:
O flickering flame... Show us now the hopeful
future the liberator shall bring us.

118615.「……やっかいなことに なりそうですな。\n しかし すべての領界をつなげねば\:
It seems it will be a difficult matter... but
if we do not connect all of the realms, this
world will surely face its destruction.

118616.「どうか その日まで……\n 竜族の民が 生きながらえますように。:
Please... until that day comes, may all of
dragonkind live on.

119330.「<pc>さんの ご友人をさらった者……\n おそらく それは……:
I'm willing to bet that your friends were
taken by...

119332.「<pc> 私が 誰だかわかりますね？: You know who I am, right?

119333.「……そうです シオンです。\n ふふっ おどろかせてしまいましたか？: That's right. It's me, Shion. Did I scare you?

119334.「その後 どうしているかが 気になって\n こちらから 連絡を取ってみたのです。:
I was curious to know how you were doing, so
I decided to reach out to you. What is it like
beyond the Abyss Gate?

119335.「……なるほど そのようなことが。\n 思っていた通り そちらの世界では\n 大:
I see, so that's it... As I expected, that
world seems to be undergoing some great
change.

119336.「あなたは 竜族の世界へと 足を踏み入れた。\n この先 何を正しく思い どう行:
You've stepped into the world of the
Nadravians. How you think and act from here
on is entirely up to you.

119337.「ですが あなたの決めたことに対し\n この人形を通して できる限りの助言を\n:
That said, I'd still like to give you as much
advice as I can through this doll in regard
to your decisions.

119338.「今回は ちゃんと 連絡が取れるか\n テストを させてもらいました。\n それ:
This time was just a test to see if I could
successfully contact you. I'll see you again
soon...

119339.「それに あの お馬さん……。\n とっても その……。かわいい…ですね。: And that horse... it's... it's really cute...

119340.「……ああ いけません。\n 今は そのような話をしているときでは\n ありませ:
Oh, I'm sorry. Now's not the time to get
sidetracked. Let's get back to what we were
discussing before.

119341.「<pc>さんの ご友人をさらった者……\n おそらく それは 邪悪なる意志の手:
Whoever kidnapped your friends... there's a
good chance it's those who serve the Evil
Will as pawns.

119343.「わざわざ すみません。\n どうしても お願いしたいことがあって……。:
I'm sorry to go to all this trouble. There's
something I really need to ask you...

119344.「あの……。この前 ここで\n あなたに見せていただいた お馬さんの人形は\n:
Um...that horse doll that you showed me the
other day...that was something you got back
in Astoltia, right?

119345.「……じつは 私。\n そういった ぬいぐるみなどの\n かわいいものに 目がな:
To tell you the truth, I... I'm extremely fond
of cute plushies...

119346.「この炎の領界には そのような玩具が\n 作られる余裕などなく 今まで どうして:
There's no room for making such kinds of
things in the Fire Realm, and there's still no
way to get one.

119347.「それで その……。もし 万が一\n 不要な ぬいぐるみがあるようでしたら\n:
So, um...if you happen to have any unwanted
plushies, would you be willing to give
them to me?<yesno><close>

119348.「あつかましいとは 思いましたが\n あの お馬さんの人形を見てから\n どうに:
I didn't want to be disrespectful, but after
seeing that doll, I just couldn't help myself
anymore.

119349.「もちろん お礼は用意しますし\n いただいた ぬいぐるみは\n 大切に この部:
I will reward you, of course! I will also take
great care to display any plushies you give
me in my room!

119350.「こんな 個人的なことを頼めるのは\n あなたしか いないのです……。\n どう:
You are the only person I can ask regarding
such a personal matter... Please do this for
me, if you can.

120608.「あなたは うーん……。\n どんな名前が 似合うかしら……。: You, um... what kind of name would suit you...

120611.「……すみません。\n あまりに夢中で あなたが来ていたことに\n 気づかなかっ:
I'm sorry. I guess I was too preoccupied to
notice you were here.

120612.「ちょっと お恥ずかしいところを\n お見せしてしまいましたね……。:
I'm afraid I've shown you something a little
embarrassing...

120613.「じつは今 いただいた ぬいぐるみに\n 名前をつけていたところなんですよ。:
I was just in the process of naming the
stuffed animal I just received.

120614.「この子たちのために 名前を考えていると\n すごく 楽しい気分になれるんです。:
I'm having so much fun thinking of names for
these kids. This is also thanks to you, isn't
it?

120615.「本当に ありがとうございました。\n これからも ぬいぐるみをいただけたら\n:
Thank you very much. I would be very happy to
receive more stuffed animals from you in the
future!

120617.「う～ん だめ……。\n どうしても クチが 動いてしまうわ。: I can't help but move my mouth.

120618.「<pc>さんのようには\n なかなか いかないものなのね……。: It's not always as easy as <pc>...

120620.「あなたには 恥ずかしいところばかり\n 見られてしまいます……。:
You see me in all the most embarrassing
ways...

120621.「前に 腹話術を見せてもらいましたよね。\n あれが 私にも できないものかと\:
You showed me ventriloquism before. I was
practicing to see if I could do the same
thing.

120622.「いつか ナドラガンドの子どもたちの前で\n 披露してあげることができたら きっ:
I thought it would be a great honor to perform
in front of the children of Nadragand
someday...

120623.「この子 どうですか？\n よく できてるでしょう？\n 見よう見まねで 作って:
What do you think of her? Isn't it well done?
I tried to make it just like I saw it.

120624.「まだ 練習を始めたばかりですけど\n きっと うまくなってみせますから！！:
I've only just started practicing, but I'm
sure I'll get better!

120625.「……と 腹話術の件は 置いておいて\n これからも ぬいぐるみをいただけたら\:
And, putting the ventriloquism aside, I would
be very happy to receive more stuffed animals
from you in the future!

120626.「こんなに たくさんのぬいぐるみを\n 贈っていただけるなんて……。:
I can't believe you sent us so many stuffed
animals...

120627.「疲れて 帰ってきたときでも\n ずらりと並んだ この子たちを見れば\n すぐに:
Even when I come home tired, I can see them
all lined up in a row and immediately get my
motivation back.

120628.「……<pc>さん。\n 私のわがままを 聞いてくださって\n 本当に ありがと:
...<pc>. Thank you so much for taking
time out of your busy schedule to help me out.

120629.「今回は 特別なお礼を 用意したんです。\n 取ってきますので お待ちください。:
I have something special for you this time.
Please wait while I go get it.

120630.エステラは たんすの中から\n何かを 取りだすと\n<pc>の前へと 戻ってきた:
Estella took something out of the wardrobe and
returned to <pc>.

120631.「うまく できているか\n ちょっと 自信がないんですけど……。: I'm not sure if I'm doing it right, but...

120632.<pc>は エステラお手製の\nギュッとエリザベッテを 受け取った！<me 60:
<pc> received Estella's
handmade Elizabette Arm Doll!<me 60>

120633.「これまで いただいてばかりでしたから\n 今度は 私から あなたに\n ぬいぐ:
I've received so many gifts in the past, and
now I wanted to give you one of my own.

120634.「名前は エリザベッテと つけました！\n <pc>さんに かわいがっていただけ:
I named her Elisabette! Pet Monster would be
very happy if <pc> would take care of
me!

120635.「ぬいぐるみという すばらしいものが\n 普通に作られている アストルティアは\:
I think Astoltia is a really wonderful place
where wonderful stuffed toys are commonly
made.

120636.「ですが いつか ナドラガンドも\n 誰もが ぬいぐるみを手に入れられるような\:
But I believe that one day Nadragand can be
transformed into a happy world where everyone
has access to a stuffed animal.

122377.「あなたの名前は\n フリュードルヒ・フォン・エッジさま！: Your name is Herr Friederich von Edge!

122821.エステラは アペカの村で起きた出来事を\n静かに 神官たちに 語って聞かせた……:
Estella calmly recounted to the other priests
the events that had transpired in Apeka
Village...

122822.「邪悪なる意志という存在については\n 教団でも 調べているのですが 残念ながら:
The Order is looking into the Evil Will's
existence, but we unfortunately do not have
any definitive proof just yet.

122823.「まるで 謎かけのような話ですが……\n ひとつだけ 試してみたいことがあります:
It does sound like a riddle, but...there is
one thing I would like to try.

122824.エステラは 祭壇の下に納められていた箱から\n何かを 取りだした！:
Estella took something out of a box that was
stashed under the altar!

122826.「<cs_pchero>さん！\n 試練の番人の相手を お願いします。\n その:
<cs_pchero>! Please take care of
the trial! I will take care of Tobias!

122827.「解放者たる あなたこそが\n 竜族すべての者の 希望なのですからな！:
As the liberator, you are the hope of all
dragonkind!

122828.「すみません。いらしてたんですね。: Sorry. I didn't know you were here.

124547.「……しかし いまだに\n 試練を すべて果たせた者は現れず\n 事態は遅々とし:
However, no one has been able to successfully
complete the trials, so things have been
progressing slowly...

124548.「<pc>さんを ここに呼んだのは\n 竜族ではない この方の存在により\n 何:
I summoned <pc> here because I
thought we might be able to bring about
change with someone who is not Nadravian.

124549.「<pc>さんのことは エステラに\n まかせます。皆さんは これまでどおり\n:
I will leave them in Estella's care. Everyone,
please continue to fulfill your respective
roles as you have been.

124573.「そして それを成すことのできる\n 解放者の出現を 待ち続けています……。:
And we continue to wait for that liberator to
finally reveal themselves to us...

124715.「<pc>さん。\n 奉炎のトーチに 炎のチカラを\n 与えてくださったようです:
It seems you were successful in powering up
the torch.

124716.「では 奉炎のトーチを 渡してください。: Please hand me the torch, if you would.

124718.<pc>は エステラに\n奉炎のトーチを 渡した。:
<pc> handed the Torch of
Offering to Estella.

124721.「お手数を おかけしました。\n あとは 聖鳥の出現を待てば……。:
Very good. Now all we can do is wait for
Flamia to appear...

124774.<center>我に挑み チカラを示せ。\nさすれば 氷の領界への道が\nそなた:
Challenge me, and show me thy strength. Only
then will the path to the Ice Realm open
before thee.

124872.「今 この世界に 異種族の者が現れたことには\n 何か 大きな意味が あるのでは:
Perhaps there is a significant meaning to the
appearance of beings from different races
in this world.

124874.「あなたが この炎の領界に 来なければ\n 魔炎鳥が 聖鳥に戻ることもなく\n:
If you hadn't come here, Flamia would still be
as the Darkflame, and the second trial would
have been left uncompleted.

124876.「そして 最後の試練として\n 私たちの前に現れた 番人を倒したのも\n 他なら:
And it was you who defeated the guardian of
the final trial as well.

124974.「エステラたちから 話は聞きました。\n あなたが 業炎の聖塔を制覇し\n 氷の:
Estella and Tobias told me everything. They
said you conquered the Fire Tower and opened
the way to the Ice Realm...

125014.「ああっ。そのようなことを言わずに……。\n 不要なもので かまわないんです。\:
Ah. Don't say such a thing... it's fine if you
don't need it. Would you be willing to give me
your stuffed animal?<yesno><close>

125016.「ありがとうございます！\n きっと <pc>さんなら\n そう言ってくださると:
Thank you!!! I knew <pc> would say
so.

125111.「来ていただけたのですね。\n ありがとうございます <pc>さん。: I'm glad you came. Thank you.

125112.「奉炎のトーチに 聖鳥の炎を授かるには\n すこし 準備をしなければなりません。:
To receive Flamia's flame, we must first
prepare the torch. It must be charged with
the power of fire.

125113.「それには この火山に巣食う ある魔物と戦い\n 炎のチカラを得る必要が あるの:
To do so, you'll have to fight against a
certain monster that inhabits the volcano...

125115.「<pc>さん。その役目を\n ぜひとも あなたに 頼みたいのです。\n どうか:
I would be grateful if you could take care of
that for me. Please, take this.

125116.<pc>は エステラから\n奉炎のトーチ（だいじなもの）を 受け取った！<me:
<pc> received
the Torch of Offering (Key Item) from Estella!<me 60>

125117.「対象となる魔物は エルダーフレイムです。\n ７匹倒せば 奉炎のトーチに\n:
Your target will be Elder Flames. If you
defeat seven, then the torch will be fully
charged with the power we need.

125118.「この火山の山頂には 聖鳥の幽居という\n 聖鳥の住まう場所があるのです。\n:
Flamia's nest lies at the summit of the
volcano. I will head there first and wait
for you.

125120.「……どうやら 間に合わなかったようですね。\n <kyodai>さん。:
Looks like you weren't quick enough,
<kyodai>.

125121.<if_woman>「……姉ちゃん。\n どうしても 前へ 進むつもりなんだね。:
You're determined to keep moving forward,
aren't you <if_woman>sis<else>bro<endif>...

125122.「さて……。どうしたものでしょう。\n 私が 何か 手を打ちますか？:
So... what will you do? Do you want me to
intervene?

125123.「……ううん。次の機会を待つよ。\n それに クロウズさんには\n やってもらい:
No... I'll wait for the next opportunity.
Besides, there's something else I want you
to do for me.

125124.「……そうでしたね。\n では ひとまず 戻りましょうか。\n 私たちの領界へ…:
That's right. Should we head back, then? To
our realm...

125125.「邪悪なる意志……か。\n あまり 時間は残されていないみたいだね。:
That Evil Will... I guess we don't have much
time left.

125126.「……<pc>。\n どうあっても 前へ 進むつもりなんだな。:
You're determined to keep moving forward,
aren't you, <pc>...

125127.「……<pc>。\n どうあっても 前へ 進むつもりなのね。:
You're determined to keep moving forward,
aren't you, <pc>...

125128.<if_woman>「……お姉ちゃん。\n どうしても 前へ 進むつもりなんだ。:
You're really determined to move forward,
aren't you...?

125129.「……いいや。次の機会を待つことにする。\n それに あんたには\n やってもら:
It's fine... I'll just wait for the next
opportunity. Besides, there's something else I
want you to do for me.

125130.「……いいえ。次の機会を待つことにするわ。\n それに クロウズさんには\n や:
It's okay... I'll just wait for the next
opportunity. Besides, there's something else I
want you to do for me.

125131.「……いいよ。次の機会を待つから。\n それに クロウズさんには\n やってもら:
That's okay... I'll just wait for the next
opportunity. Besides, there's something else I
want you to do for me.

125132.「邪悪なる意志……か。\n あまり 時間は残されていないようだな。:
That Evil Will... I guess we don't have much
time left.

125133.「邪悪なる意志……か。\n あまり 時間は残されていないようね。:
That Evil Will... I guess we don't have much
time left.

125134.「邪悪なる意志……か。\n あまり 時間は残されていないみたいね。:
That Evil Will... I guess we don't have much
time left.

130574.「こうやって ウデに つけられたら\n ぬいぐるみと いつも 一緒にいられて\n:
I made it so that I could always be with my
stuffed animal if it was attached to my udder
like this.

130626.「主な者は そろったようですし\n 氷の領界の報告を お願いできますかな。:
Now that you have all returned, I would like
to hear your report on the Ice Realm.

130627.「ははっ！ 氷の領界は その全土を\n 分厚い氷で おおわれており\n それはも:
Yes! The Ice Realm was extremely cold, with
thick ice covering every inch of the place!

130628.「我々は 寒さに耐え 氷の世界を進みました。\n そして 試練の塔を探し求めて\:
We braved through the harsh cold in search of
the tower of trials. During our search, we
came across a certain cave!

130629.「しかし そこで 現地の者から\n 白銀の死神と おそれられている凶悪な魔物に\:
However, inside we encountered a terrible
monster the locals call "the Silver Slayer"...

130630.「我々をかばった トビアスさまが\n 大ケガを負ってしまい それで\n いったん:
Tobias protected us, but suffered very severe
injuries... so we had to withdraw...

130632.「かなり あぶない状態だったのですが\n なんとか 一命は 取りとめました。\n:
The situation was quite dire, but he managed
to survive. Right now he is resting in his
room.

130634.「ふうむ……。やはり 氷の領界も\n ひと筋縄ではいかない 危険な場所だと\n:
Hmm... it seems the Ice Realm is quite
dangerous and not so easy to traverse...

130635.「オルストフさま。トビアスに代わり\n 私が 氷の領界へ 向かいたいと思います。:
Master Orstov. On Tobias' behalf, I would like
to go to the Ice Realm. May I please have
your permission?

130636.「安全を確保できてからと 思っていましたが\n こうなっては いたしかたありませ:
I thought it'd be best to wait until it was
safe, but it seems we have no choice now.
I'll leave it to you, Estella.

130637.「そして <pc>さん。\n エステラとともに あなたも\n 氷の領界へ 行って:
<pc>. Would you please go along
with Estella to the Ice Realm?<yesno><close>

130638.「おお 行っていただけますか！\n 感謝いたしますぞ <pc>さん。: Oh, you will! Thank you very much.

130639.「<pc>さん。\n ともに 氷の領界へ 向かいましょう。\n 私は あなたの後:
Let's make our way to the Ice Realm,
<pc>. I'll be right behind you.

130640.「氷の領界への道は 聖都エジャルナの\n 南西に建つ 業炎の聖塔のさらに先。\n:
The path to the Ice Realm lies at the Disc
Ruins you visited before, located nearby the
Fire Tower to the southwest of here.

131687.「氷の領界の 現状を見定めて\n 次なる領界への道を 開いてください。\n どう:
Please see what you can find in the Ice Realm,
and open the path to the next realm.
We are counting on your success.

133435.「我々だけでは いかんともしがたい。\n 解放者としての あなたのチカラを\n:
We can't do this alone. As the liberator, we
will need your strength.

133436.「<pc>さん……。\n エステラとともに あなたも\n 氷の領界へ 行っていた:
Would you please go along with Estella to
the Ice Realm?<yesno><close>

135918.「おお <pc>さん。\n わざわざ お呼びだてして 申し訳ない。\n お待ちし:
Ah, <pc>. I apologize for the
trouble of calling you here. But, I've
been expecting you.

135919.「ようやく トビアスが\n 闇の領界の調査から 帰還いたしましてな。:
Tobias has finally returned from his
investigation of the Dark Realm.

135920.「トビアスからの報告によれば 闇の領界は\n 深き闇に閉ざされ いたるところから:
He reported that it is a terrifying place of
a deep darkness, with toxic gas spewing from
every corner...

135921.「そのため 闇の領界の民は\n みな 毒と病に 苦しんでいるそうなのです。\n:
Because of that, it seems that the people who
live there are all afflicted with poison and
disease... just like Estella's hometown.

135922.「調査結果をもとに トビアスには\n 闇の領界の毒を 打ち消すことのできる\n:
Based on those findings, I urged Tobias to
procure an antidote that could counteract
the Dark Realm's poison.

135923.「我が教団の 研究部門が 総力をあげて\n 取り組んでいるのだが\n 完成の見込:
The researchers of the Order are all making a
coordinated effort to complete it, but as
of now it still has yet to go anywhere.

135924.「このとおりの有様なのですが 闇の領界のことで\n <pc>さんには どうしても:
On that note, I have some important
information I'd like to share with you,
<pc>.

135925.「あなたが お探しのご友人の中に\n 行方不明の女性が いたはずでしたな。:
There is a missing woman among the friends
you are searching for, is there not?

135926.「調査中 凶悪な魔物に襲われた 教団の者たちを\n 赤い肌の 異種族の女性が\n:
During the investigation, the Order was attacked by a vicious monster, and they stated that a red-skinned woman of a different race
had saved them.

135927.「その女性は 魔物たちを倒すと すぐに\n いずこかへと 立ち去ってしまったとか:
As soon as the monsters were defeated, she
left...

135928.「もしも その女性が\n あなたが お探しの ご友人なのだとしたら\n 急ぎ お:
If this woman is one of your missing friends,
I thought I'd let you know as soon as
possible.

135929.「その赤い肌の女性は 行方知れずだそうですが\n 闇の領界へ 向かえば\n 何か:
That woman's whereabouts are still unknown,
but you may be able to find some clues if
you travel to the Dark Realm.

135930.「教団としても あなたに頼るしかないのです。\n <pc>さん。どうか 闇の領界:
The Order has no choice but to rely on
your help. Please, <pc>. Will you
go to the Dark Realm on our behalf?<yesno><close>

135931.「なんと……！？\n <pc>さん。\n そんなことを おっしゃらないでください:
What...?! <pc>, please do not say
such negative things.

135932.「我々としても 解放者さまのチカラに\n すがるしかないのです。\n なにとぞ:
We have no choice but to rely on you, the
liberator. Please reconsider...

135933.「もう一度 おたずねしましょう。\n <pc>さん。\n 闇の領界へ 行ってはい:
I'll ask you once again. <pc>,
would you please go to the Dark Realm on
behalf of the Order?<yesno><close>

135934.「おお 行っていただけますか！ 感謝します。\n ならば エステラを 補佐につけ:
Oh, you will! I'm relieved. In that case,
please allow Estella to assist you. I'm sure
she will no doubt be of great help.

135935.「解放者どの 頼みましたぞ。\n 闇の領界への道は 氷晶の聖塔の 南東\n 円盤:
We'll leave it to you, then, liberator. The
way to the Dark Realm is located to the
southeast of the Ice Tower, in the Disc Ruins.

135936.「解放者さま。あなたならば きっと\n 次なる救いへの道を 見つけてくださるはず:
I know you will find the next path to our
salvation, liberator. I have faith in you...

140466.「……解毒剤がなければ これ以上\n 闇の領界の調査を 進めることもかなわん。\:
And without that antidote, we're unable to
proceed any further with our investigation...
We're at our wit's end here.

140467.「もし 危険を承知で ご友人のため\n 闇の領界へ旅立たれるのなら 我々にかわっ:
If you're willing to take the risk of going
there for your friend's sake, we would be most
grateful if you continued our investigation.

144117.「おお……解放者さま。 \n ご足労いただき まことに すみません。:
Ah, our liberator... Thank you very much for
coming.

144118.「じつは お願いがあり…… \n 非常に面目次第もない お話なのですが……。:
Actually, I have a favor to ask you... but
it's quite embarrassing...

144119.「水の領界へ渡った 我が教団の団員たちは \n いまだ 聖塔へと至る道を\n 見:
Those of the Order who made their way to the
Water Realm have yet to find where the tower
is...

144120.「……要するに まだ 水の領界の調査で\n 成果を 得られていないということだ。:
In short, we've yet to get any noteworthy
results from their investigation.

144121.「まったく なんのための調査団であるのか。\n ……ふがいない。:
Why even have a team to investigate in the
first place...? It's a disgrace...

144122.「神官たちは 皆 アタマが固く\n 柔軟な発想に 欠けるきらいがあるな……。:
The priests tend to be thick skulled and have
no desire to think for themselves...

144123.「子は 親に似ると言いますから\n 私のアタマの固さに 似てしまったのでしょう。:
They say children take after their parents, so
that must've been my hard head that rubbed
off on them. I'm quite ashamed...

144124.「そこで……今いちど 解放者さまの\n おチカラを 貸していただきたいのです。:
That's why... I'd like to ask for your help
once more.

144125.「どうか これより 水の領界へ渡り \n その手で 活路をお開きいただけませんか:
Will you travel into the Water Realm and open
the path to the next by yourself?<yesno><close>

144126.「解放者さまに 頼りきりで 心苦しい限りですが \n 我らには 打つ手がなく……:
It pains me to have to rely on you so much,
but we have no one else to turn to... Please,
will you help us?<yesno><close>

144127.「おお ありがとうございます……！\n 水の領界の調査に行っている 教団員たちに:
Oh, thank you, thank you! If you would, please
aid those of the Order who are conducting
investigations there.

144128.「エステラにも <pc>さんとともに\n 水の領界へ渡るよう 伝えてあります。\:
I have also told Estella to accompany you.
Please make your way to the Disc Ruins in
the Dark Realm.

144129.「心より お頼み申します。\n 竜の民の行く道に 希望のともし火を……。:
This is my sincere request... please light a
beacon of hope for all dragonkind...
